Beer With Geeks 126: Fat Man’s Theme

23 Sep 2016
Beer With Geeks Podcasts

This week on Beer With Geeks, Tim and Frank take a look at their favorite non-superhero characters in superhero movies. Both the MCU and the DCEU get some love, and some of their picks will surprise you. Cheers!
